import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List domains"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/domains"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns only the domains the caller is allowed to access.

Access rules:
- If the user has the `domain_all` permission, all domains are returned.
- If the user has any assigned domain groups or individual domains, only those domains are returned
  (even if the user's own domain is not included).
- If nothing is assigned, only the user's own domain is returned.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"per_page","description":"Results per page (min 1, max 200).","example":50,"required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","description":"Results per page (min 1, max 200).","example":50}},{"in":"query","name":"page","description":"Page number.","example":1,"required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","description":"Page number.","example":1}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
